replies.msg:
half life should be similiar since dioxin is stable.

it should be physically removed, or dispersed wild enough its concentration in air particles is lower than limit level

https://www.hongkongfp.com/2019/11/14/hong-kong-reporter-diagnosed-chloracne-tear-gas-exposure-prompting-public-health-concerns/

Hopefully media teams have got enough info. and started to let everyone know.....

This is serious. Political issue turns into medical issue which may probably affect lots of people now or later....

Somehow HK people need HK govt., popo, and Lam to sign written statements to guarantee 1) there is no medical risks of tg or any release of dioxin 2) they personally and HK govt will take full legal responsibilities for all the tg used in the past and in the future.



HK people should be seriously concerned!!!
